text: GOD bol LAHKY Z heavens ZEM. allegory Jeho lahky bol lenze z concave zrkadlo lampa miesto glass container. glass container bol chapavy pearl-like star Kurivo thereof zasoba zehnat oil-producing strom ze bol neither eastern nor zapadny! Its olej je skoro self-radiating; nie zapalit ignite it Kypry upon lahky! GOD guides JEHO LAHKY whoever wills guided GOD thus cites parables LUDIA. GOD bol fully aware z all things
